allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: LinkedIn job fetcher with improved Show More handling

Features:
- Playwright-based LinkedIn job scraping
- Improved "Show more" button clicking with multiple selectors
- Scroll-to-view before clicking for reliability
- Fallback button detection via page.evaluate
- Clean description text \(remove Show more/less remnants\)
- Concurrency and rate limiting support
- Block detection \(login, captcha, rate limit\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" repo create resume-builder --private --source=. --remote=origin --push)
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" repo create job-fetcher --private --source=. --remote=origin --push)
